Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hello son. If you're watching this, that means I'm already dead. Life is a road--

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: How do you know it's going to be a boy?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How, would you stop interrupting please?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yesterday I was scraping some gunk off my wall sockets with a metal fork and I gave myself the nastiest shock. And when I came to, I had an epiphery. Life is precious. And if I die I want my son to know the dealio. The dealio of life.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Here are some things that I want to teach you that your mother won't be able to.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: To jump start a car, first pop the hood. Then you take these bad boys and clip them anywhere on the engine. Then you take these and clip them wherever.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [Shakes head]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Number eight, learn how to take off a woman's bra.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We will demonstrate on Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No. No. [Leaves]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Come on.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [Dwight is wearing a bra] You just twist your hand until something breaks.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ow.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well you get the picture. Thanks Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And remember no matter what, I will always love you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What if he's a murderer?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: He's not going to be a murderer.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Maybe that's how you die.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know what, Dwight, do you want to do this, or no?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I want to do this.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay. From the top. Ready? Three-

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Action.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hello everyone! As you know, we are six days away from Phyllis' wedding. [Applause] So get your suits to the dry cleaner and get your hair did. And Karen, um, you might want to invest in a dress or a skirt of some kind if you don't already have one. This may be Phyllis' only wedding ever. It is my job to ensure that none of you look like ragamuffins. So I am instituting prima nocta.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Prima nocta, I believe from the movie Braveheart, and confirmed on wikipedia, is when the king got to deflower every new bride on her wedding night. So...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm sorry. I had a very different understanding as to what prima nocta meant.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm trying to get everyone excited about Phyllis' wedding because I want her to get people excited about my wedding when the time comes. Which won't be hard, because it's going to be awesome. A lot better than hers, that's for sure. It'll probably be on a boat.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What's up spinsters?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Nothing. You know this is a luncheon shower. Girls only.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No problem. The guys are having a little shindig of their own in the warehouse. From 2:30 to 3:15. It is the only time that Bob was available. Sort of a guy's night out. A G-N-O if you will. A Gah-No. Actually, it's more of a guy's afternoon in. A G-A-I. A gay. Not- not- it's uh, not gay, it's just a, it's a bridal shower for guys. A guy shower. An hour long shower with guys.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: I guess Jim and I have had a little bit of a rough patch for the past couple weeks but we had some really good talks and actually now I think that we're better than ever.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Karen and I had a long talk last night and the night before that and uh, every night, for the last five nights.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Something's up with Jim and Karen. Not that I've been eavesdropping. It's not really any of my business, but I've gotten pretty good at reading the back of Jim's neck.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Halpert! Tall, queer, handsome as ever. Hey everybody it's me, Jim. Hello, hello. Todd Packer.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Karen Fillipelli. Jim's girlfriend.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Shut up!

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Yep.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Shut it!

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: That's rude.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Either this chick is a dude or Halpert got scared straight!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes. Yes! Oh! There-oh! [Clutches chest and falls to the floor]

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: What happened?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh God-

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Quick somebody help! Help the man! [Pretends to kick Michael]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, no, no!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I can't believe you're not going to be there. It's going to be good, it's going to be a great bachelor party man.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: I have a full day of sales calls.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You should get out of them.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: [Breaks pencil.]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's the only time he can do it. 2:30 to 3:15. It's going to be great. We're going to be doing some darts, we're going to be grilling up some steaks, got some pie. Going to be very delicious.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: And what kind of stripper did you get?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I did not order a stripper.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: You didn't order a stripper? Have you ever even been to a bachelor party?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Um, not personally, no.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Mike, okay, a stripper is bachelor party 101. If you don't get a stripper your party is going to suck it hard.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I can't get a stripper here. Sexual Harassment.

Quote.Speaker: Packer
Quote.Text: Just get one for the girls too. That evens it out. You know, separate but equal.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So that's what that means.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay everybody, slight change of plans, we are still going to be having two parties but each is going to get a little extra dose of naught-ay. Uh! [Spanks himself]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Alright! Uh! [Spanks himself]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Gay.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay. Co-ed naked strippers in this office. For realsies.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Under no circumstance should a man strip off his clothes in this office.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: SHUT UP ANGELA!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ugh.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Ugh.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Everything okay?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh yeah. Why?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Well you seem a little tired.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh. Yeah well, I guess there's been a couple late nights. Karen and I have been up talking.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You should get more sleep.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah, I know I should.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Never underestimate the power of a good night's sleep.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, I'm sure you're right.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: When I get eight hours, compared to like six hours, like, big difference.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh yeah. Gotta get your REM cycle going with the whole sleeping. Better than not.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Good advice Beesley. Thanks. See you out there.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah. Don't fall asleep at your desk. [Turning towards the vending machine] Oh my God.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay. We are off. Ryan and I are going to go get some supplies and I need you to handle hiring the strippers.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Absolutely not.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm on it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well get on it. And make it happen.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ruddy cheeks, thick calves, no tats, no moles, no tats. No, TATS. Of course I want-

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Stop. That's disgusting.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Leave me alone and get the male stripper.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Fine.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I knew you would, Nancy.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Sally.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No preference, what do you think redhead or brunette?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Blonde.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Nice. Do you have any blonde women?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [Giggles.]

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: He hasn't even said a word yet. Just giggling.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [Pokes Ryan with a sex toy.] Gotcha, oh! [Phone rings.] Yes?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Are you okay?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm in the, I'm in the sex shop.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Ah, gotcha. Okay, so they have Albert Einstein, Ben Franklin, or Sponge Bob Squarepants.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Squarepants?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yep, Spongebob Squarepants.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And you think that'd be sexy?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Michael referred me to a male strip club called Banana Slings. Instead, I called the Scholastic Speakers of Pennsylvania.

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Hold the door please!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh. Hello!

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Hello!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You wearing a thong?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Sparkling cider is very good.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I think that's champagne.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [Spits champagne back into her glass]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Hello ladies. Who here is a history buff? Who's a fan of buff naked? Without further ado, the one, the only, the sexy Mr. Benjamin Franklin.

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Thank you for that introduction, Mr. Scott, and good afternoon fine gentlewomen of Dunder Mifflin.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Half pants, right Mr. Franklin?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Knickers in fact, yes!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: He's in his knickers. Mr. Franklin, I would say you are probably one of the sexiest presidents ever.

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Well, actually, I never was president.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, but, Ben Franklin was.

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Ah. I'm here to teach you a little bit about my life and the era of the founding fathers.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And when they came over on the Mayflower. Bow chicka bow.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Wait, this is the entertainment?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, alright, so I want you to give him your undivided attention and Mr. Franklin, if any of these ladies misbehave I give you permission to spank them. Especially that one. [Points to Phyllis]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Have you ever seen a stripper before?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yes. Jennifer Garner portrayed one on Alias. It was one of her many aliases.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah, me neither.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: I'm Elizabeth, I'm the dancer that was requested.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, I specifically ordered a stripper.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: I'm the stripper.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, okay good. Well in the future please identify yourself as such.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [Phone rings] Oh God.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [Reading the text message] Is she hot? Text back, "Kind of."

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: It was a warm June evening in 1752, the night of my fateful kite flight.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Mr. Franklin?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Yes?

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Do you have a girlfriend?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: I have a lovely wife, Deborah.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: But don't you also have girlfriends in Paris? Like a lot of them?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Uh, well that is a grey area of my life. Okay? So, it was a warm June evening.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Look at that. Nothing like grilling in the great outdoors.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Is this the same grill you grilled your foot on?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Oh gross.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: But I got all the foot off of it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay Ben Franklin!

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Ben Franklin tied a cherry stem with his mouth!

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Well, that is because I am a renaissance man.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ben Franklin, do you wear boxers, briefs, or pantaloons?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Well, you're very saucy! [Winks at Pam.]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Guys, beef! It's what's for dinner! Who wants some man meat?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I do! I want some man meat!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Michael, Dwight would like your man meat.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well then my man meat, he shall have. There you go. Deliciousity.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: [Stanley's fork breaks.] Of course.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: So I guess you have the Ben Franklin wig and the costume and you figure, how can I put this to practical use?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Well I like to think that his dad was a Ben Franklin impersonator and he really pressured him into it.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Hey um, I wanted to talk to you. I know this is weird or whatever, but Jim told me about you guys.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What do you mean?

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Well that you kissed. And we talked it through and it's totally fine, it's not a big deal. It's just a kiss. Wait- you're not still interested in him?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh no, I was confused by your phrasing. You should definitely go out with Jim. I mean, you're going out with Jim. I'm not going out with Jim. You're dating him, which is awesome, because you guys are great together.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I'm not into Jim. Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: So um, well good.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah. Sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: What are you sorry about?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Um, what?

Quote.Speaker: Karen
Quote.Text: What are you sorry about?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Nothing. I was just thinking of something else.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Okay. The game is no limit deuce to seven lowball. Lines twenty five fifty, nickels are worth ten, dimes twenty-five, and quarters fifty. Nothing wild.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I call shuffle. Here we go. [Spreads cards out all over the table]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ah, gentlemen, the entertainment is here. Everybody I'd like to introduce you to Elizabeth.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Hi guys!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Nice outfit.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: I hear there's an important meeting here.

Quote.Speaker: Roy
Quote.Text: I'm not really into strippers. You know what I find sexy? Pam's art. She's an artist and I appreciate that. It's very moving and sexy. The art.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Hit it. [Feel Like Makin' Love plays in background] So where's the groom?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: He's right there. There he is.

Quote.Speaker: Bob Vance
Quote.Text: Absolutely not. That's all you. That's all you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay. Alright, I'll do it. Yeah. Lets do it. Lets do this thing. Yeah. What do I?

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Just sit on down.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Alright.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Alright.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Here we go.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Here we go. Alright!

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Yeah!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Not bad! Not bad! You smell nice. Like Tide.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Mmm, what's that?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You smell like Tide detergent. Do you use Tide detergent? Ha ha ha! I have a girlfriend so...

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: I bet she'd be jealous. [Rips off shirt]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah she probably, yeah she would be. You know what, okay, excuse me. Please stop it, stop it. Turn off the music. This is wrong, this is wrong! This is wrong! I have a girlfriend. And you are engaged and I'm sure you have a boyfriend in prison or something so lets just clear out okay. Shame on you. Go back to work!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Elizabeth, I want you to sit here. When the phone rings, answer it.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: You want me to answer phones with my clothes on.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: We hired you for three hours work and we're going to get it.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Oh I love your poster.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [Mouths 'hi' at the stripper]

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: You know I invented electricity.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I know.

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Well I'm sensing a little electricity right here.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Didn't Ben Franklin have syphilis?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Yes, but I don't. My name is Gordon.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ohhh.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: On one hand I want to be honest with Jan and tell her the truth but on the other hand I'm afraid she's going to dump me.

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: You know Michael, I fathered an illegitimate son.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Really.

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: But I kept all this from my wife Deborah. These things only serve to upset the women. They are the gentler sex.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well, Ben Franklin, you're really kind of a sleezebag.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Stripper? Could I ask you a question about women? Um, should I tell my girlfriend that you danced up on me?

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Secrets, secrets are no fun. Secrets, secrets hurt someone.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Wow. Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Care for a piece of chocolate?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Chocolate! Where did you acquire it? That is a delicacy in the Amazon but it has not yet been imported to the United States.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Who is the king of Austria?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Joseph the 2nd.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Who is the king of Prussia?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Fredrick Wilhelm the 3rd.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Who is the king of England?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Why the tyrant King George, of course!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I don't care what Jim says, that is not the real Ben Franklin. I am 99% sure.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: [On speaker phone] Michael, I left a meeting. What is so urgent? Are you, are you okay?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Not really, look I don't know how to say this so I just will.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I went to a bachelor party and things got a little out of hand.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: Uh when, when did, when last night?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, today at work.

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: You went to a bachelor party at work?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes. I kind of arranged it.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Well I don't even think the stripper was that hot. Do you guys think she was hot?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Kelly don't do this.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Do what? I just asked you a question.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: You know what you're doing.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Anyway, do you know who was totally flirting with Ben Franklin? Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Really? Looks like I hired the right guy. I'm glad. Any real potential there Beesley?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah, right. God, I need a boyfriend. You know Ryan I'm totally ready to be set up with one of your business school friends. Whenever.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: Oh my God, I would get so fat if I worked here.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah? I lose my appetite all the time.

Quote.Speaker: Elizabeth
Quote.Text: You could strip you know.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Thanks.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So you don't want to end our relationship?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: I'm closer to firing you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That is so sweet. You are the best GD girlfriend in the world. Do you know that?

Quote.Speaker: Jan
Quote.Text: I'll talk to you later.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You are. You are.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So you know who turned out to be kind of a creep? Ben Franklin. And Elizabeth the stripper gave me great advice. Which rhymed. Really makes you wonder how Ben Franklin can become president, but someone like Elizabeth can't.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Are you near sighted or far sighted?

Quote.Speaker: Ben Franklin
Quote.Text: Both. That's why I invented the bifocal.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: GAH!!!
